channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump strips security clearances from law firm tied to Jack Smith cases
item.description: The White House said President Donald Trump will sign a memo suspending the security clearances of several employees of Covington & Burling LLP after ...

item.title: Trump admin guts White House Correspondents Association in bid to end 'monopoly' of 'DC journalists'

item.title: Nearly 40% of contracts canceled by Musk's DOGE are expected to produce no savings
item.description: Nearly 40% of the federal contracts that President Donald Trump's administration claims to have canceled as part of its signature cost-cutting program...

item.title: North Dakota Sen. Kevin Cramer is recovering from head injuries after slipping on ice
item.description: U.S. Sen. Kevin Cramer of North Dakota is recovering at his Bismarck home after injuring his head over the weekend when he slipped on ice.

item.title: Curb Your Hysteria
item.description: For the Trump critics, for the Trump supporters, for those hysterical about either: Remember the virtues of wisdom, grace, and restraint.

item.title: Making America Healthy Again Starts With Addressing The Root Causes Of Infertility
item.description: Making America Healthy Again starts with stopping Big Pharma’s reach. That includes its integral role in in vitro fertilization.

item.title: The Great Energy Divide Is About Beliefs, Not Principles
item.description: Fossil fuel opponents have based their policies on the hope that ‘green’ energy will someday become reliable and affordable.

item.title: Ohio transgender bathroom law takes effect as top proponent calls it ‘victory for safety & common sense’
item.description: Gov. Mike DeWine signed a bill in November that went into effect Tuesday denoting bathroom use by biological sex.

item.title: The federal funding freeze is inciting fear and chaos for millions with cancer. There’s a better way
item.description: Uncertainty for people with cancer can mean delayed care, missed appointments, and strain that results in worse health outcomes.

item.title: Trump’s threat to EV trucking rules undermines big-rig bets
item.description: The darkening landscape for EV rules is a blow to businesses that have poured gobs of money into California’s expected clean-energy transition.

item.title: DOGE’s Work Is Meaningless Unless Republicans Get Serious About Cutting Spending
item.description: DOGE's work in uncovering abuse of taxpayer dollars will be meaningless unless Republicans get serious about D.C.'s spending problem.

item.description: Consumer confidence turned negative in February due to concerns about persistent inflation and other economic uncertainties, a key index reported Tues...

item.title: Bills Keeping Foreign Money Out Of Ballot Measure Campaigns Pick Up Steam In Republican States
item.description: Republican lawmakers in several states are making a concerted effort to keep foreign money out of ballot initiative campaigns.

item.title: AI is everywhere except in worker productivity stats
item.description: It looks like a return to Solow's Paradox as CEO views of AI's advantage diverge.

item.title: Goldman says U.S. households to pay $170 if oil tariffs imposed
item.description: Analysts said that a 10% U.S. tariff on crude oil would not significantly boost U.S. production.

item.title: Home Depot exec says Americans may soon embrace sky-high mortgage rates as ‘the new normal’ and invest in housing anyway
item.description: Historic mortgage rates show today’s rates are more "normal" than they were just a few decades ago.

item.title: The High Stakes of the Wisconsin Supreme Court Race
item.description: Voters should elect Brad Schimel to prevent Scott Walker’s union reforms from being overturned.

item.title: NYT Blasts Dr. Oz’s Financial Disclosure, While Jennifer Granholm’s Near-Identical One Escaped Scrutiny
item.description: Dr. Mehmet Oz's financial disclosure is nearly identical to the document filed by former Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm.

item.title: What Is the Future of Investing? Augmented Intelligence
item.description: How can we design a financial system that integrates AI with human intelligence?

item.title: Decoding PE Buyouts: The Full Financial Picture is in the Consolidated Accounts
item.description: As the PE landscape evolves, investment professionals must understand how to correctly capture the full picture of a portfolio company’s performance.

item.title: Chat Logs Show Queer NSA Employees Discussing Perverted Acts At Work
item.description: The NSA said it will take action against employees who abused government systems to talk about their fetishes and mutilation surgeries.
